Title: Enacts the "police and peace officer licensing act"
Summary: Enacts the "police and peace officer licensing act".
LawCode: Amd §840, add §841-e, Exec L; amd §§1.20 & 2.10, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to enacting the "police and peace officer licensing act"
